en: Praise ye Jehovah. Praise, O ye servants of Jehovah, Praise the name of Jehovah.
hmr: LALPA chu inpâk ro. Aw LALPA siehlawhai, inpâk unla, LALPA hming chu inpâk ro.

en: Blessed be the name of Jehovah From this time forth and for evermore.
hmr: LALPA hming chu inpâkin um raw se, Tuta inthawka kumkhaw- tluongin.

en: From the rising of the sun unto the going down of the same Jehovah’s name is to be praised.
hmr: Nisa suoknaa inthawka a tlâk- na chenin, LALPA hming chu inpâk ding a nih.

en: Jehovah is high above all nations, And his glory above the heavens.
hmr: LALPA chu hnam tinrênghai chunga chun chunghnung dai a na, A ropuina chun vânhai khi a khûm dai a nih.

en: Who is like unto Jehovah our God, That hath his seat on high,
hmr: LALPA ei Pathien ang tu am an um a? Chungtienga ṭhungpha neia,

en: That humbleth himself to behold The things that are in heaven and in the earth?
hmr: Vâna thil umhai le hnuoia thil umhai en dinga, Insukhnuoi hlak ang hi tu am an um a?

en: He raiseth up the poor out of the dust, And lifteth up the needy from the dunghill;
hmr: Ama chun rimsi chu pilvuta inthawk chun a keitho hlak a, Pasie chu êkthlia inthawk chun a dawm kâng hlak;

en: That he may set him with princes, Even with the princes of his people.
hmr: Mi lienhai kuoma ân umtir theina dingin, A mihai laia mi lienhai kuoma ngei chun.

en: He maketh the barren woman to keep house, And to be a joyful mother of children. Praise ye Jehovah.
hmr: Ama chun nuhmei ching chu in le lo ân vawngtir hlak a, Nau nei mi hlimtakah a siem hlak; LALPA chu inpâk ro.
